page.title: 12Attitudes
page.content: Residents are very happy to be living where they do, very much appreciating their seclusion and the beauty of their surroundings. They care for its conservation. The general reply to the question "What is it like to live here?" was "Fantastic, wouldn't live anywhere else!" There are many young people who are enthusiastic in restoring their properties, preserving their woodlands, walking by the river, leaving them very little time for conventional hobbies. Because of the remoteness of their homes and lack of public transport, they have to rely on the use of their own motor-vehicles.
